articles.description: JuJu Smith-Schuster revealed that he isn’t getting paid by TikTok. What a shame. He’s been acting a fool for free. Dwayne Haskins can relate.
articles.content:
SportsPulse: We have just two weeks left in the regular season. Mackenzie Salmon lets you know where everyone stands in this week's risers and fallers.
USA TODAY
JuJu Smith-Schuster walked it back … [+7119 chars]
